name: Magnetic Reconnection Simulation
description: A single time step from a computational simulation of magnetic reconnection.
acknowledgement: Bill Daughton (LANL) and Berk Geveci (KitWare). Please acknowledge paper http://arxiv.org/abs/1405.4040.

bibtex.title: Formation of Hard Power Laws in the Energetic Particle Spectra Resulting from Relativistic Magnetic Reconnection
bibtex.author: Guo, Fan and Li, Hui and Daughton, William and Liu, Yi-Hsin
